DOC.brief_summary: This study examine hypothesis , subcutaneous administration liraglutide , analogue incretin glucagon-like peptide 1 , 5 week improve memory function healthy human .
DOC.criteria: Male sex Age 1835 year Body mass index 19 25 kg/m2 Nonsmoker Receipt drug within 4 week prior trial Any known acute chronic disease brain , heart , lung , kidney , liver , pancreas gastrointestinal tract , metabolic , endocrine psychiatric disease . Brady Tachycardia , i.e . heart rate < 50 > 90 beat per minute . Hypertension ( systolic blood pressure > 150 mmHg , diastolic blood pressure > 90 mmHg ) .
